New York University Archives
Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging Publications
Tisch School of the Arts. Department of Photography and Imaging
Tisch School of the Arts. Department of Photography and Imaging
RG.35.5
3 linear feet in 3 manuscript boxes and 1 oversize flat box
1985-2017 The Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts is a four-year BFA program focused on the making and understanding of images through an arts curriculum grounded in liberal arts education. Students and faculty in the department work in varied modes of analog and digital photo-based image making and multimedia. This collection consists of publications from the Department of Photography and Imaging from the late 1980s through the 2010s, and includes catalogs, programs from exhibitions, and copies of ISO magazine. Materials in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of publications from Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts from the late 1980s through the 2010s, and includes catalogs, programs from exhibitions, and copies of ISO magazine.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Historical Note
The Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts is a four-year BFA program focused on the making and understanding of images through an arts curriculum grounded in liberal arts education. Students and faculty in the department work in varied modes of analog and digital photo-based image making and multimedia.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by New York University are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact university-archives@nyu.edu.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Transferred by Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging in September 2017; the accession number associated with this transfer is 2019.037.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging Publications; RG 35.5; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders, and described on the collection-level with a box-list inventory.
